price: بەڵام ئەوانەی کە بڕوایان ھێناوە وکردەوە باشەکانیان کردووە، بۆ ئەوان ھەیە پاداشتی بێ بڕانەوە
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun ghayru mamnūnin
